pages.text: You've spotted some unusual trees that are unlike any other. They seemed to naturally grow less commonly than the usual collection of trees.

The pale Gloom Trees can be found within swamps and the Murk Trees can be found in forests or hills. Interestingly, these trees and its wood are non-flammable. Useful for building wooden structures that don't burn due to a mishap with a non-campfire fireplace.
